-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | QuickCheck convenience functions for use with test-sandbox
--   
@package test-sandbox-quickcheck
@version 0.1.0

module Test.Sandbox.QuickCheck

-- | Tests a property and prints the results to stdout.
quickCheck :: PropertyM Sandbox () -> Sandbox ()

-- | Tests a property, using test arguments, and prints the results to
--   stdout.
quickCheckWith :: Args -> PropertyM Sandbox () -> Sandbox ()

-- | Tests a property and prints the results and all test cases generated
--   to stdout.
verboseCheck :: PropertyM Sandbox () -> Sandbox ()

-- | Tests a property, using test arguments, and prints the results and all
--   test cases generated to stdout.
verboseCheckWith :: Args -> PropertyM Sandbox () -> Sandbox ()
